price: Saa (Qur’aan) yi yε Afutusεm a nhyira wͻ mu a Yɛasiane; enti mobεpo anaa?
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
